entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:13 a.m. NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to drizzle and ending near noon then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
